summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that verify the functionality of the BackendEstimatorV2 primitive. The tests cover estimation of observable expectation values, handling of parameter bindings, interaction with various backends (including simulators and fake devices), and proper error handling for unsupported features.
business_intent: Ensure that the BackendEstimatorV2 primitive works correctly across different quantum backends, providing reliable expectation value estimation for quantum algorithms within the Qiskit framework.
